content: I think I'll focus on creating a Facebook event and Instagram stories to reach out to the same audience that attended the Summer Market. I'll also create an email list and send out regular newsletters with updates, promotions, and exclusive offers. I'll make sure to use high-quality visuals, clear and concise descriptions, and regular updates to keep attendees engaged and excited. Additionally, I'll use relevant keywords, hashtags, and captions to increase visibility and encourage audience participation.
